::Prowl/Firearm::

Prowl frowns as he and Firearm fly by the Ark on their way back to 
base. There was something important to him in that ship, but he 
couldn't think of what. It bothered him every time he tried to 
remember what it was.

"Hey, you go ahead, I'll catch up," he says to Firearm and turns, 
heading for the Ark. Firearm nods, continuing toward Earth.
